content: make your own adorable mini bear with this quick and easy no-sew pattern this pattern is perfect for craft fairs/markets and with valentines day coming it would make a sweet gift for loved ones or for kids to give to their friends the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy the free written pattern can be found here 1 on my blog **materials ** * super bulky yarn * 4 5mm crochet hook * 8mm safety eyes * 4 ply yarn in black * a small amount of worsted weight yarn * polyester fiberfill * stitch marker yarn needle scissors the finished item measure approximately 2 5 6 5cm tall item size may vary depending on gauge and materials used 1 https //www stitchbyfay com/no-sew-crochet-bear-pattern/
